entry.title: Multi-touch Attribution: What am I training for ?
entry.summary:
Description

In this talk, I focus on a key challenge of designing a Multi-touch attribution solution - Identifying which methodology is best for this problem. This is a thorny issue as the variable we are trying to study isn't directly observable. Iâ€™ll discuss a novel approach to tackle this problem through simulated marketing environment.

HowToTrainYourMLSolutionForLatentVariables
